resources.string:
For more info, visit www.rockument.com.

Another earthquake shook Jakarta on Wednesday at around 1.30 p.m. The Meteorology, Climatology and Geophysics Agency (BMKG) said the magnitude of the earthquake was 5.1 and was centered in Lebak, Banten. The earthquake followed a bigger jolt on Tuesday that killed a man, Nana Karyana, 40, and damaged 1,125 houses in Banten.
